event.name: christmas-night
event.title: Christmas Night
event.description: Merry Christmas Everyone! Ho! Ho! Ho!
event.details1: Come and celebrate with us at Kalgan's Rest Restaurant. We have prepared a feast for you and your mates! The restaurant will be decorated with Christmas lights, we guarantee it will be cozy and beautiful.
event.details2: There will be seafood, meat and lots of desserts! Check out the Christmas Menu and make sure you don't miss out!
